QuestionTxt: Do you think most scientists agree with one another about whether or not global warming is happening, or do you think there is a lot of disagreement among scientists on this issue?
StudyNote: The interviews included landline and cell-phone-only respondents. Interviews were conducted by TNS Intersearch.
